name: The Janitor (itch) (David B, Aaron King, memjamim, CharlieAustin, bingonoid)
name_original: The Janitor (itch) (David B, Aaron King, memjamim, CharlieAustin, bingonoid)
description: In this game you, the janitor,  prevent the no-good aliens from Uranus from using your precious bathrooms throughout the mall. Navigate around the mall and set up traps for the nasty aliens, while avoiding causing havoc for the normal inhabitants of the mall.
